Reporting Problems

In order to make ECLiPSe as useful and reliable as possible, we would like to encourage users to submit problem reports via the web site
http://www.icparc.ic.ac.uk/eclipse/bugs.html
or by e-mail to
eclipse-bugs@icparc.ic.ac.uk

Warwick Harvey
2005-01-25
